description: P79ResultGroup: Measurement of minimal residual disease (MRD) flow on day 79 of childhood Leukemia treatment, with values of '>=25%', '<25%', '>=0.1% - <5%', '<0.1%', '<0.1%', 'Sample not taken', or 'No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible'.

details.9: No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible
